texts.text: Additional functionality: Warchief pride -> Taunting up to 1.5 seconds after a takedown heals Garrosh 25% of his maximum health on the end.
subtexts: Enemies will have vision of Garrosh when he is taunting even if it's on cooldown.

general.developerCommentary: A brutal leader that wants to intimidate the enemy should have the possibility to do it.

texts.text: For every 2% missing maximum health Garrosh receive 3% extra attack speed
Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Bloodthirst by 1 second.

changes.name: New: Bull rush

texts.text: Garrosh runs in a straigh line, knockbacking enemies that enters on contact with him.
subtexts: Range will be 7.0 | Valla Vault has 5.0 range | Dwarf Toss has 8.0 range
Missile Speed will be 15 | Valla Vault is 14 | Dwarf toss is 30
Cast needs to be finished before being to cast skills

changes.developerCommentary: Even tho this gives Garrosh great mobility it's on cost of not getting cleanse also it's on par with the character angry style.

changes.name: New: Groundbreaking tactics

texts.text: GroundBreaker can now be channeled for up to 2 seconds, increasing the outer area radius up to 40%. If channeled to Maximum enemies will be pulled towards Garrosh instead of stunned

changes.developerCommentary: Inspired on Sion Decimating Smash and justify the old garrosh interaction being gatekeeped by maximum channeling and by not picking cleanse

changes.name: In for the kill, Thirst for Battle
changes.developerCommentary: I see no purpose for In for the kill with the new talent i made for level 1 Brutality as it takes the same effect and Thirsft for battle is really niche and i don't think it fits Garrosh, not the non-heroic killing but the spammable non-heroic style

changes.name: Intimidation

texts.text: Additional functionality: Not hitting Heroes on the Groundbreaker Outer Radius reduces the cooldown by 2 seconds.

changes.developerCommentary: I want to make throwing non-heroic units something viable rather than a mistake

changes.name: Lok-tar ogar!

texts.text: Changed functionality: Into the Fray's target throw target stuns enemies near the impact area for 0.25 seconds, if the target is a non-heroic unit reduces the cooldown by 20 seconds.

changes.developerCommentary: I want to make throwing non-heroic units something viable rather than a mistake

changes.name: Double Up renamed to Don't let them run

texts.text: Changed functionality: Increase Garrosh movement speed by %1 every 4% missing health capping at 15%. This Talent only take effect if there's an visible enemy hero close to Garrosh.

changes.developerCommentary: One thing that i always wanted was a talent to make Garrosh pursuing better especially on a decimate focused build

changes.name: Body Check

texts.text: Body Check won't reduce heal received anymore instead it will prevent enemy heros from using dash abilities for 3 seconds.

changes.developerCommentary: Garrosh is a character that suffers a lot against mobility characters and this talent itself still not make it eazy for Garrosh to deal with this weaklings BUT turns him into a menace if he gets in range and making the kill eazy.

changes.name: Earthshaker
changes.developerCommentary: With the changes to Lok-tar Ogar! there's no need anymore for that talent

changes.name: New: Bloodhowl

texts.text: After Garrosh uses Groundbreaker, three additional waves are created sequentially from the edge of the original area. Each wave deals 81 damage and stuns enemies for 0.5 seconds.
subtexts: Additional waves are affected by groundbreaking tactics size increase but won't pull the enemies.

changes.developerCommentary: I wanted to empower groundbreaker somehow and this, this is good. I really like the concept of Angry Garrosh simply destroying the ground angry as he is and it also feels like an level 20 talent.

changes.name: Inner rage
changes.developerCommentary: I dislike talents that forces it to be picked with other if you want to use them like the Leoric level 13,16 talents on the vanilla game and i hate it even more when it forces you to pick a talent to use it.
